attributes.action: Discontinue supply of UK currency and credit by the Bank of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To bring the UK money supply/currency under full control of the UK treasury and dispense with the Bank of England as the lender to the UK government.
This would result in unnecessary loan interest(debt) being added into the equation which is one of the fundamental problems with having our money supply dictated to the UK government and people by a Privately owned Central bank.
